Downing Street's indication that Andy Coulson will not be receiving severance pay is in line with the standard contract for special advisers, it said. The contract, drawn up in June, reads: Because of the power of the Crown to dismiss at will, you are not entitled to a period of notice terminating your employment. However, unless your employment is terminated by agreement, results from... disciplinary proceedings, inefficiency or grounds justifying summary dismissal at common law, you will in practice normally be given not less than three months' notice in writing terminating your employment. On the expiration of such notice, your employment will terminate. 66% of ComRes respondents thought PM should not have hired Andy Coulson knowing he had resigned as NoW editor over phone-hacking scandal. Mike Pence says he won't run for presidency U.S. Rep. Mike Pence shut the door Thursday on a run for the presidency but left wide open the likelihood that he'll seek a different office: Governor of Indiana. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mike Pence , R-Columbus, said of himself and wife Karen in a letter being sent to supporters.
